title: Chat Bug

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: When using the chatroom with a friend the messages fell out of order, and when i type a new message it brings me all the way back down to the bottom which shows my messages from Thursday.

replies.body: Thanks Qao, this is helpful. If you find more bugs or feedback, there is a tool in the client you can use to get it to us directly. Look for the bug icon in the bottom right corner of the friends list. Keep it coming!
I hope you guys got about 3-4 bugs related to the chat and the status i've sent. There are some bad bugs about the chat after finishing a game.

just an advise: post bugs better next time [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-bugs) and not on the client discussion board. just to keep it seperated and easier for riotler :)
